issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink, Phone>Play Movie>Remote streaming 2, when the movie finishes playing on all other iOS devices the movie still appears on the view. For iPhone 3 GS, the movie is gone, and the view is blank.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS (SDK 1.7.X) onto device
2) Navigate to Phone>Play Movie>Remote streaming 2
3) Play movie until completion

Result:
View is left blank

Expected Result:
Movie still remains on view

Notes:
OCCURS in 1.6.2
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink: Phone>Play Movie>Remote streaming 2, iPhone 3GS finishes movie with no still shot in view
fields.environment: iPhone 3GS (3.1.2) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201106011734, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X rc9515533

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer in use.
